charges.charge_description: 21:952=CI.F---COCAINE; IMPORT;CONSPIRE; POSSESS WITH INTENT TO DISTRIBUTE, 21:841A=ND.F COCAINE - SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE, 21:846=ND.F CONSPIRACY TO DISTRIBUTE COCAINE
Possess with intent to distribute 5 kilograms or more of cocaine.  Penalty: 10 years and/or $10 million, $100 cvf, 5 years min tsr(2)

charges.charge_disposition: 63 mos to serve; 5 yrs srt, comply with all standard and mandatory conditions; $100 s/a; fine waived; Special condition not to return to the United States illegally waived appeal. Sentence Modified by Order on 1/21/15; Sentence imposed is reduced to 57 Months.

charges.charge_description: Conspiracy to possess with intent to distribute 5 kilograms or more of cocaine. Penalty: 10 years and/or $10 million, $100 cvf, 5 years min tsr(1)
Importation of 5 kilograms or more of cocaine.  Penalty: 10 years and/or $10 million, $100 cvf, 5 years min tsr(3)
International Money Laundering Conspiracy. Importation of 5 kilograms or more of cocaine.  Penalty: 10 years and/or $10 million, $100 cvf, 5 years min tsr(4)
